instruction: Pour 10 mL of ethanol into beaker_B. Agitate beaker_B for 2 min. Pour 50 mL from beaker_B into beaker_A. Move box_A to plate_A.
Pour 25 mL of water into flask_B. Heat flask_B to 0 C. Move box_A to plate_B.
Add 50 mL of water to beaker_B. Agitate beaker_B for 2 min. Relocate box_A onto plate_A.
Pour 25 mL of water into flask_B. Agitate flask_B for 1 min. Pour 50 mL from flask_B into flask_A. Place box_A on plate_A.
Pour 25 mL of ethanol into flask_B. Bring flask_B to 25 C. Send 50 mL from flask_B to beaker_B. Clean beaker_B.
Add 10 mL of water to flask_B. Stir the solution in flask_B for 30 s. Pour 10 mL from flask_B into beaker_A. Clean beaker_A. Put bottle_A on top of plate_A.
Place 50 mL of water into beaker_A. Heat beaker_A to 25 C. Move 50 mL of liquid from beaker_A into beaker_B.
Pour 25 mL of ethanol into flask_A. Pour 25 mL from flask_A into beaker_A. Clean beaker_A.
Add 25 mL of water to flask_A. Stir the solution in flask_A for 1 min. Send 10 mL from flask_A to beaker_A. Rinse and clean beaker_A. Move bottle_A to plate_B.
Place 50 mL of ethanol into flask_A. Stir flask_A for 1 min. Set the temperature of flask_A to 60 C. Pour 10 mL from flask_A into beaker_A. Clean beaker_A. Relocate box_A onto plate_A.
